itunes:title: EPISODE 257: Deep State Takes L
title: EPISODE 257: Deep State Takes L
description:
Drew Hernandez fills in for Jack Posobiec! Former President Donald Trump said ‘sinister outside sources’ are forcing the DOJ and the FBI to do ‘wrong things’; plus, the judge has granted Trump’s request to have a special master review the documents seized at Mar-a-Lago. Next, during a Labor Day speech, President Joe Biden accused a heckler of ‘destroying democracy’ and claimed that MAGA conservatives are trying to take away personal rights - not the current administration. The Biden administration plans to demand that foreign nations ban ‘conversion therapy’ of trans youth - they intend to use the US Embassys to push for the mutilation of children’s genitals. And finally, the body of Memphis heiress Eliza Fletcher was discovered, and the suspect - Cleotha Abston - was charged with the kidnapping; however, this is not the first time he was charged with kidnapping (thank you, Defund The Police movement, for ensuring that lawlessness abounds). 




Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO  


Go to patriotmobile.com/poso/ or call 972-PATRIOT to get free activation with offer code POSO
